lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Welcome to tonight's episode of Critical Role, where a bunch of us nerdy-ass voice actors sit around and play Dungeons & Dragons. Oh, that was good. Well done.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We all had to fought to be heard that time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah! It helps when you all say it at once because it just becomes noise at that point and nothing really affects me. I find it funny, it amuses. So yes, welcome! Before we jump into tonight's game, let's go through some quick announcements. First and foremost, we have returning our fantastic sponsor and partner for the beginning of this campaign into the foreseeable future: D&D Beyond!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: D&D Beyond!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sam, do you have a--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Guys, check out DnDBeyond.com. They're giving away a Legendary Bundle on their Facebook page. A Legendary Bundle contains every digital source available on D&D Beyond, all reference books, including a pre-order for Mordenkainen's Tome of Foes. Go to Facebook.com/DnDBeyond, check out that top pinned post for instructions. Last week, as you all know, I sent out a request saying, "Send "me your stories of D&D Beyond, mail me your stories," so I got some viewer mail to read. "Dear "Sam, you're my favorite on Critical Role, don't tell Travis!"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fucking dicks.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: "Dear Sam, I own a convenience store, we have your show on our TV all the time, love you as Nott, but "please be aware I've filed an injunction to keep you a hundred feet away from the store. We have "you on-camera stealing jars of mayonnaise and smearing them all over your body. PS: D&D Beyond "rocks." Okay. "Dear Sam, to answer your question: No, we do not consider 16 jars of Hellman's "mayonnaise slathered over your naked body appropriate attire for our furry convention. No, "it does not matter if you use Cool-Whip instead, your credentials have been revoked, please stop "asking." There's nothing even about D&D Beyond in that one. But hey! D&D Beyond!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Didn't realize mayonnaise could be a fursona, but I guess we all learned something tonight. Thank you, Sam.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's great camouflage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I think Matt went dead inside.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I was looking at his face as that was going on, was like--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What is going on, Sam? Thank you, Sam.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I guess somebody at this table used to go to furry conventions.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nothing wrong with that, unless you're covered in mayonnaise.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It does not go well with fur.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Also, Talks Machina, of course, is every Tuesday night at 7:00PM Pacific here on Twitch and Project Alpha, hosted by our fantastic Brian W. Foster.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hey!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Nailed it! You know our friend's name.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's going to be your announcement from now on. Cabbageman Foster is a fantastic host of the show, you can check him out next week, thank you, Brian. Podcast of last week's episode is available where all fine podcasts downloadable, so if you want the audio version, or your friends are listening to the audio versions, they can find it now and be caught up after this episode, I guess.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (loud whisper) Can I have a pencil?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (loud whisper) Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm talking!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm sorry. I just saw that she had pencils.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I have a bunch as well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's okay. Heads up to all of our fans, we're going to be at Emerald City Comic Con. Our good friends at Dark Horse will be selling the print version of Vox Machina: Origins #1.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They already are, aren't they?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, it's happening

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, that's right, because it's already there! There you go.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And there's copies for us in this building somewhere.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are there?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You have fluff on your chin.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You got it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Just leave it there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There you go.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's right. There's a limited number.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, they only have 1000 copies, so if you're going to get one, get it soon.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's it?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, that's it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They might be gone already!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Could be.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's gone, you got it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The limit's only five copies per person, per day, so we'll see how that works out. That's Dark Horse, booth 1708 at the event, so if you're going to be there, look for that. Also, you'll be able to look for these two folks. You guys are flying out to that tomorrow, right?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We are.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Early, early, early in the morning.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We'll be there around noon thirty for our first panel of the day.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We have a couple of Critical Role things tomorrow, so come say hi.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Issue five of the comic book, by the way, goes up March 7th, so next week, you'll be able to check out the fifth comic, the next stage in the story.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Character development.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's pretty awesome, actually. I'm excited for you guys to check it out. I'm excited to read it myself, so keep an eye out for that. You can find it on Dark Horse's digital comics platform, comiXology, and many other places you can find on the Geek & Sundry website that I didn't bother to put down. Once again, reminding that 826LA and 826 in general is our partner-friend charity from the very beginning of this whole stream and we're still pushing them because they're amazing. Check them out if you haven't had the chance; they do great work, and maybe you can do great work with them either by helping support them--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Go volunteer! Go start a D&D club! Hit them up! Kids and D&D are hilarious.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As a heads up, I'll be at Lexington Comic & Toy Convention next weekend in Kentucky, so for those of you guys who are in that vicinity, come say hello to me!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Represent!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Exactly.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hometown! Well, not really. An hour and a half outside my hometown!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Partial, yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Relatively. It's fine. Come and hopefully see me there! We'll have events and signings and all kinds of good stuff, so, yay! I think that's almost all of the announcements?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Matt Key: Key Question! That's on Tuesday.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm excited about that one.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's going to be good. It's got some good shit in it, been looking at the edits. So yeah. Go watch.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And... I think that's it, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All this! This right here!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's currently available in the store right now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's available in the store.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Limited number, limited quality. I think there are only one.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Available where you can find all babies.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Very excited to not have to hide it on the show anymore! Thanks for blocking my belly the whole time.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Certainly. Your turn to block mine!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yay!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We got our new Critter coming. So excited.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's right. We rolled a character sheet for our baby on our announcement.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I like Bladder Kick. That one's my favorite.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That was pretty great. If you guys haven't seen it yet on Laura and Travis' Twitter, you can go and see the announcement page. It's pretty adorable.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I like his flaws: poops his pants.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a pretty big flaw... and for some people it's a strength. I don't know.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The baby is sitting playing Dungeons & Dragons with us.

lines.name: LIAM, LAURA
lines.text: Right now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The baby is being watched by so many people.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't be shy baby, it's okay!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hey, are you guys going to hold a Critter contest to name your child?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What a good idea, Sam! No! (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Son of a-- go ahead and do that. Go ahead.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Send those suggestions to @laurabaileyVO on twitter.com!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You're definitely live-streaming the birth though, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, live-streaming the birth. We're going to Periscope the birth for sure. My goal is to go into labor while we're playing on a Thursday night.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We laugh now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How great would that be?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, man.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, we played the game once in that back office, so we could just move to you and then bring the stuff with us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's true, yeah!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Dwarven Forge, Dwarven Forge, Dwarven Forge.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: On that note! Congratulations to the two of you guys, we're all super excited for you.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Yay!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All of you together managed to make your way through, save a number of lives-- (burps) pardon me-- encounter the priest of these gnollish creatures who had been using these members of the town to help feed a mother manticore. To retrieve some of the living members, you managed to get into battle with it. Nott slew the baby manticore, drawing its ire, and you all, by the skin of your teeth, took both the priest and her out, and in doing so saved the lives of those that were within, retrieved a small bounty of things that were caught within the nest and the priest's corpse, and made your way back to town. Upon arriving-- (shuffling chairs, laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Anything for that butt-shot, Sam.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's Sam's gift to you guys. Upon returning, the sun had set. A number of members of the city of Alfield began to thank you for what you've done. They began to come out into the streets and began to make small campfires and play music and basically take this moment to both grieve and be thankful that there are individuals who will stand up and show strength in the face of darkness even this far out on the edges of the empire. In this time, you realize right about now that your new friend Shakäste seems to have vanished from the vicinity. You glance about, and at a quick look, he's gone.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Where did Shakäste go?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know. He's very mysterious.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He's the coolest.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's like the wind. (gasps) Maybe he was the Traveler!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What does that mean, the Traveler?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The Traveler.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What does that mean?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's like a deity.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, yeah, mostly. Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean, he takes many forms.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you worship the Traveler?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe I'm the Traveler.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, maybe she doesn't worship the Traveler.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's more like my best friend.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Jester, don't you think that if that was the Traveler he would have said, "Hey. I'm the Traveler."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Probably.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He didn't seem very irreverent in the way the Traveler seems to be.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How do you know what the Traveler's like? Do you hang out with the Traveler too?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, but I hang out with you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, right. Well, he's probably not the Traveler, then.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I liked that guy, though. He was good.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He was.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He was pretty cool.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He was talented.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are you okay, Caleb? You went a little quiet there for a little while.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is that your first time killing something? Or somebody?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He was burned alive in front of me.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, you did that, though.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I am well aware that I killed a person. I have nothing else to say, why is everyone looking at me?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Have you ever killed someone before?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We were worried. You kind of went into a state. Just making sure you are all right.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All right, yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It was terribly grisly; his hair was on fire and he burned horribly. Maybe it went a little further than I anticipated-- I have killed people before in defense,

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, there's one surefire way to make sure that he's all right, which is, we get drunk on something really expensive and listen to the stories of all the people we just saved so you can feel better about everything that just happened.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, that sounds good.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And we're going to spend a ridiculous amount of the money we just made.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm okay with that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I am too.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, didn't we get some items as well?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, yeah! Who was it that had that stuff?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That just happened.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes, you, the small one in the back.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, we have a silver ring with a little blue gem on it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I have it?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hold on a second!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I like rings!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fucking pace yourself, all right? Yeah, I know. The bling is going to come your way, all right? We have a carved wand. Anybody have a wand that's not carved?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is it a stick?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It is.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I like sticks.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, shit. Well. Yeah. We got some chained manacles, they're some big sons of bitches with a bunch of runes on the cuffs.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ooh.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I like manacles.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Who ended up grabbing the goggles? Did I grab the goggles? I got them off the priest!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You did, yes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to pull them out, take a look at them.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Those are fancy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The base of them is a soft leather that's been cured and taken care of once you manage to wipe off some of the blood and soot from the remains of the previous owner. It's a set of goggles that can be comfortably placed over your head, and the glass elements, or the lenses of them have a bluish-purple sheen to them.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I put them on.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Would you like to know what they are before you put them on?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Too late, man. It's like Thir13en Ghosts (screams). No, I don't know.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What does it look like? Is it like a kaleidoscope?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: When you place them over your eyes, because immediately in the vicinity there's the few small bonfires people have gathered around, other than that, it's a dark night sky with stars peeking through the elements of the clouds that have broken apart. It looks like a cloudfront is still blowing in from the eastern side of the valley, but from what little bit of the sky you can see, the stars are there. Upon placing the lenses over your eyes, you have clear definition of all the nearby buildings, the dark alleyways. You have a very clear perspective on anything that is not directly being hit by firelight, and the firelight is almost a little too bright.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Holy shit, you guys. Is this what you can see all the time?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't know, what does it look like?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's like I got night vision! Like I can see... things!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Look over here. You look like a nerd.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can deal with that, it's fine.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's great. With you humans--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can see shit!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, it's real important. We were running into problems--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm curious, can I try them on really quick?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do they fit over your--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, I got to unstrap them. I'm holding them up--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It tugs all of your horn jewelry and under it in an uncomfortable way.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Jingle jangle jingle jingle.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No effect, actually.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, this is nothing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Lies.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hey, Caleb.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can you see through my clothes?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do you want me to see through your clothes?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Nah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I remember you have an ability to identify?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't have ability, I understand certain magics. If you want me to explain what those things are before you try them willy-nilly, yes, I can tell you--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ooh, then look at the ring that I want!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, sure, yes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: May I see it?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Absolutely. Here's the silver ring with the blue gem.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. You know, I'm just going to check D&D Beyond to see if I-- Yeah, I'm all tapped, but--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Maybe you could just look at it and see with your smarts.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I will tell you something.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Motherfucker.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He totally just took the ring from--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I know!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I will tell you something: I don't need to have this ring, I can tell you what it is.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Do you have Identify as a spell?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I do, but I need a pearl. I say to Fjord, I need a somewhat valuable pearl, then I can do it all day long. I can know what anything is, even though I am tired.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ooh, do any of the rings that I have on my fingers have a pearl on them?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How about the one that I stole from her?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The ring that would have the pearl on it is no longer on your hand, and the one that you have does have set into it a fairly nice pearl.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (gasps) You have a pearl!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Would you--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is that worth about a hundred gold pieces?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can certainly try.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, yes, let me-- Can I borrow this?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I want it back, though.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This is not instantaneous. Since I am so tired, it takes me a little bit longer. I wedge out one of my books and I set it on the ground.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do you want to go to--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Instead of setting a book on the ground, let's sit at a table at a pub or bar.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We'll make sure you're not disturbed.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's up to you. I haven't done this in a while and I'm excited to do it. But I could hold off a little.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I require drink and lumbar support.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, I take the book and I close it and then I put it back.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you want me to carry it for you?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, I have both the ring and the one that Fjord gave me. So if it's good for you, you may have it. I'm more interested in executing skill.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay, yeah. Molly, I need something from you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Find us a fucking bar.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: On it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Should we just go to the Feed and Mead?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let's do it!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Or somewhere else?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I hope they have milk.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Because the Candleglow Inn is fucking toast.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to just literally yell at the top of my lungs in the middle of the crowd: I'm looking for the best pub in this bloody town!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As soon as you finish screaming it, you turn around and go face to face with Crute, the rather rough-looking dwarf who runs the Feed and Mead where you guys have been staying. He goes, "Huh, "that would be my place where you are staying."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Onward!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Everyone around is like "Eh." But he's already got your attention. He leads you guys back to the familiar Feed and Mead. Where has been empty previously when you guys were staying there, now there seems to be a little bit of an air of celebration. Since that is where you guys are going, other people are following and it seems the party is going where you're going. As you enter the place, Crute seems excited because now all of a sudden there's a burst in clientele.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Pub crawl.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: There's only one pub.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you begin to order your drinks, many of the various villagers prevent you from paying. For the remainder of the evening, your drinks are on the town of Alfield.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Very, very generous. Fucking drink up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Before we even go into the building, I go over to Nott and adjust the hood a little bit further forward.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are my ears tucked back in?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The ears are in and make sure that the mask is secure. Have fun.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. You're really all right, Caleb?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, I'm okay. It was a rough night.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I know, but you went a bit catatonic.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I did.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did you see anything or have a vision? I don't know.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, I did not see a vision. I saw a burning person.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right. They were bad.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Let's go get a drink.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Anybody who tries to buy me a drink, I slip a silver into their pocket. Let me know how low we get.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nobody seems to notice. Those that even do watch you aren't going to argue. Now, is that just drinks on you?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: When any time we let them buy us drinks, I'm just going to put a silver in anybody's pocket who's buying us drinks.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, depending on how many rounds you guys want, that'll put you down about two gold probably by the time the night is done.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Done.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to keep getting shots and pouring them into my flask and going up and asking for another.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Caleb, you're spending time--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to find a corner table in the ruckus. I will take the ring with the pearl, and I hold it right here. I pull out the other ring and I look at it and I begin to focus and study the different angles of it and hope that I have a pearl of enough value to make things happen.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to sit next to Caleb and watch it all happen.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is riveting.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't you need to pull out your book so you can look at your spells?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's already out.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You know when you play D&D, you don't narrate taking a pooper, but you can assume that the characters take a pooper every day.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (chagrined) I narrated it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is true.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Some things just happen.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: While he's doing everything he's doing, I'm going try to very subtly draw a dick in his book.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a sleight of hand check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (singing) It's a dick in a book.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Natural 20!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Natural dick 20.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 20 god damn dicks.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, the pearl is enough for you to focus on the spell.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The ring.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What is it?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is this our first item?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And you know what this is.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's our first item!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What is it, Caleb?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This is good. You may have it. I don't get into water too much, as you could guess. This is good for walking yourself upon water. You take this, as promised.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's rad.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You can stand on and move across any liquid surface?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, but also why is there a dickbutt in my spellbook?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Where did that come from?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't know. Maybe it was Nott pulling a prank on me.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Probably. It was probably Nott. Wow, this ring is so cool!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hey, Caleb, are you exhausted from that experience? We do have other items to--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, I don't need-- well, I do want one drink, but I don't need a ton of drinks. This is my thing, so what else did we get?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We have a carved stick-- wand.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I will take the wand.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yup.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: These big fucking chain manacles I've just got over my shoulder.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I need another ten minutes. Fjord, would you get me a second whiskey? By the time you get back, maybe I will understand what this is.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I ain't a fucking waitress.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ten minutes later.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep. Look at the majesty of this.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What is it?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's a wand of dickbutts.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How fortunate.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (sighs)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What is it?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's the: Do I tell them or do I not?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What is it?!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh. Do you know how to use wands?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Of course I do.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is she full of shit? What do I roll?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an insight check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. I got a 15.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She seems to be on the level.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, I'm on the level.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This is too dangerous for you to have. I'm keeping this one--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, just tell me what it is, Caleb!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No it's for me, I gave you the ring. That's the deal. I promised it to you and now you have it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What does the wand do?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I was going to say, you can just share.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You have to tell us.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: If I tell you, you will try to steal it from me.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, I swear I won't.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Unless it's a wand that makes doughnuts or pickles, then I probably won't try to steal it, probably.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, Caleb!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm taking his drink away. You don't get to drink.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We have one other item. Not that I don't love my posture being corrected.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You technically have two more.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Fine, do you want to know what it does?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I will show you what it does.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What does it do? Wait, he's doing it!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, he's casting the wand.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I point this stick at Jester.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, make a-- is it a wisdom or charisma?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It is a charisma saving throw.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Charisma saving throw, please.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ah, oh Jesus. Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: First party death.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Insta-death.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, okay, okay. Oh, 12.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, it's just a stick.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, it didn't do anything?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No. Told you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's a very low DC, because I rolled shit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: A low what?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, that's a nine, right? It's a nein!

lines.name: SAM, MARISHA
lines.text: Nein.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Plus three.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How about these them there chain manacles? So I can get my spine back in alignment.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You look like you're into some shit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I promise you'll have these back because I cannot lift them. Would you put them on the table for me?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (crash) Onto the table.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: They're fucking huge.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hold the ring and wait.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They once were, and you can tell by the runes at the base of where the manacles clink together that they were at some point sealed. Whatever enchantment was on them has been released.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Tell me they're super valuable. That was a fucking bitch to lug around.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You have to wear them. It's extraneous, it's too much.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Seems extreme.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's overkill.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, all right. Well, mysterious wonders.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What kind of metal is it?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, I was going to say, it's a lot of good metal. We can always sell it for scrap metal.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: To the blacksmith.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I like that more.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's also the glaive.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I have a glaive. Look at this glaive.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Didn't we get a pendant off of the priest?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, there was a glove.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh yeah, the red glove!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: These are shit. I slide them off the table--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (crash) Everyone who's near in the vicinity all of a sudden turns as this loud, heavy clatter of metal chains--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Back to your drinks, everything's fine.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I want to do it again. What do we have? Give me the thing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: A glaive.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Whoa!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's a big thing.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. Oh.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is it too dangerous for me to have?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's too dangerous.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, this is great. It's very powerful. It is a fine weapon. Probably better than anything-- except maybe for your blade. Is anyone able to use a glaive? I can't do anything with it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What is a glaive?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A glaive is a polearm with a giant axe blade at the top of it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Beau could use it, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's not a monk weapon.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is it something that I could use?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a two-handed weapon, yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I use a two-handed weapon? Oh, I have a shield.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have a shield, you'd have to get rid of your shield and I have go to see if you have the capability to even use it. Because I don't think you know-- do you know simple weapons?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Let me double check real fast. As far as I know--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I need to get a better weapon, though, you guys. Because this sickle doesn't do much.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's very pretty.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's really cool-looking, right? That's why got it. How's it balanced, is it good?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's very nice.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you aren't proficient with glaives, unfortunately.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do you know what this is? It is a very good sale at a pawn shop.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: None of us can use it?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, what does it do, because how much is it worth?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, it's very painful if it hits you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So it is magical?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Most definitely it is magical, yes. Stronger than your average glaive, that's what I am saying, yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Great, yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I have a feeling that no one in this town could afford it right now. But when we get to--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Zadash.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Zadash. I might know a few contacts that might want something.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You know people in Zadash?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I know people everywhere.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm writing magic glaive.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh yeah, who's keeping stuff? Are you our stuff keeper?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Who's got the oven mitt?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Who's got the monster calves to carry this? There you go.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (grunts)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oven mitt?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Here.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Red oven mitt, who's got it?

lines.name: SAM, LAURA
lines.text: I don't know.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Who had the red oven mitt?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Was it on the priest?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It was on the priest.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I have it. I got it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm looking at you while I say it the whole time.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I've got my goggles on and I'm just like--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I grab the nose piece and go (fwoosh) (impact).

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I just punch him in the shoulder really hard.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (pained) Yeah, ah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, your left arm goes numb for a while.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I pull out the oven mitt.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh my goodness, yeah. Like 45 minutes have gone by looking at all these things.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys have all grown steadily more intoxicated.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Not me, because I drink milk.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And not me, because I've just been getting them and pouring them.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What is it? Can you shoot fire from your hands? Can you shoot lightning from your hands? Can you catch things really well?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Does it make a very good macaroni and cheese?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He just puts it away.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't like Caleb looking at our shit anymore. He just looks at it and steals it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He puts the wand down in front of Jester.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (gasps)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What's with the oven mitt?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It just hurts people.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This is the wand, this is just it?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is so cute.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait, it hurts people so you're going to hang onto it?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is a great wand.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do you know how to use arcane artifacts?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It doesn't matter if I know how to use arcane artifacts. Stuff that hurts people could still be beneficial to our cause, because other people want to hurt us.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I mean, she has a point. I know how to use arcane artifacts.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, why don't you see if Fjord wants it?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I point the wand at Nott.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I rolled a four.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughs)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You watch from beneath the mask--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I pull the mask down.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The edges of the toothy goblin grin curl into this uncontrollable smile that threatens to crack the sides of her face.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my goodness. That's really creepy, Nott.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can't stop!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How do I make it stop?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know, dear gods!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Nott, why so serious?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It hurts!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think it lasts for a while.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh gods! It's painful!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At this point, these two young farm boys, that were in there drinking in the back and watching, listening in, are just staring at Nott and backing away slowly to the back of the room. "We got to go."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We got to go!" They leave the room and everyone else just looking over. Yeah, it's caused a bit of a scene.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The Wand of Smiles.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes it's a Wand of Smiles. They have to roll a DC of ten for charisma saving throw or be forced to smile for a minute.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes, awesome.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's the cutest fucking wand!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Love it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I love it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I wonder if it works on animals.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We'll find out. Where's-- oh, Frumpkin.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Frumpkin's gone.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He's not gone. He's always with me and he will be back tomorrow.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Back to the glove thing, though.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. It burns people like I burned that man.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh. Well, you don't want to keep it. You hate burning people.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Exactly.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That could come in very handy.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's not fair for you to put your issues onto literal inanimate objects.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Would you like to trade your goggles for them?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No. I can't use arcane shit. But he can.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You have that very fancy sword you have.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. But sometimes you need batting gloves.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Does it mean that much to you? Would you like it?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I would like to see it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. Here it is.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep. Hold on. That's a fucking glove of fire.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do your thing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You have to stick it on your forehead.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Does it require attunement?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't know. No. He's good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: After putting it on, you would actually know the properties of it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, sweet! What are the properties of it?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Give him the damn paper.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't move at the speed of your thought.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay. Cool. Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What does it do?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's a Scorching Ray spell. A little plus five.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I will not take any of the spoils of anything we find anywhere. Enjoy.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, you didn't frame it that way, though. You put it under the guise of this is bad, this hurts people.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It does hurt people. You seem very angry at me right now.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm just wondering what your deal is.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Look. This ring is perfect for you. That way if we get near water you don't go in it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm slowly, ever so slowly beginning to like you, so please don't fuck it up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think that we should all say thank you to Caleb for identifying our objects.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Cheers to Caleb!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. That's not the issue. But cheers!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This is what people do.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And Nott, may I say thank you for saving my life, because I was in a fucking pickle in there and if you hadn't gone and slaughtered that little baby manticore, I'd have been fucked. So thank you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're welcome.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thank you, Fjord, for saving my life.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Did I save your life?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Didn't you give me a potion?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I did. Yeah. That's right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I woke up and you were over me giving me a potion like a knight in shining armor.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You would have done it for me.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I probably would have. Probably. I did do it for you though, Nott.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did you save me?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I saved your life!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is she still smiling?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. It's faded by now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I hold the wand under the table at Caleb's leg and try to do it to him too.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a charisma saving throw.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's constitution though, isn't it?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's charisma. You had me do charisma.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I said constitution to you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She did charisma.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. I'm sure I'll fail it. 15.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You succeeded, but you didn't even know I tried.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you guys finish your cheer, everyone else in the room also lifts their drinks. "Hurrah!" They all give a cheer as well.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Huzzah.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Huzzah!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Eventually, whether through just general exhaustion or imbibement, you bring yourself to rest, finding yourselves back to the singular room you've all been sharing here at the Feed and Mead.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh yeah. Should we get another room now that we've got some extra coin?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How many rooms do they have at the inn?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Three.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's not a big place.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are they vacant?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At the moment? Yes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We can get an extra room.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Let's buy them all out.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Whoa! Hey, big spender! What?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll take my own room if y'all don't want in.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But we have always been roommates.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Then come join me, girl!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Crute, while he has been happy to provide you the evenings free for two rooms, even for all you've done, "I am a businessman, through and through, so I'll give you a discount. Three silver."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Done.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's really hard.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Craft fair Laura is dying.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I will also pay for a room for Nott and Caleb.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Of course. Then that will be also three silver."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Wait did you just,

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I paid for me. Here, for giving you shit earlier. I give three silver.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Thank you." (laughs) You have your own room now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (imitates Crute's laugh)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Danke

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Today has been the most profitable day in my life. I have never seen so much money cross my path.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: More money will come tomorrow because we are selling the ears tomorrow!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is ridiculous.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Where are the ears? Someone has them safe.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Of course, yeah, I have the ears right here in this pickle jar.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Maybe it should be in Caleb and I's room because we'll have the alarm to protect us.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, I have them, it's okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is somebody just going to show up and say I--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Like who wants pickled ears really, except for me?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to go get my cat! I go up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to go eat some pickled ears!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to watch this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Do you actually partake in pickled ears?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, I don't. I go upstairs and I'm conversing with the Traveler.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, you're going to do your thing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I go up and head up to the room as well.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to doodle and talk to the Traveler.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You all find yourselves going about what final business you have for the evening before rest takes you. You are doing your--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, I first take out the silver thread and I cross it across the door and if there's any windows there, I do the same and allow for Nott to enter and leave. Then I draw patterns along the floor that spread up onto the table as well and back down onto the floor. I squat with my book since I am tapped and I begin to bring back my cat. An hour and ten minutes later, I don't know if they're asleep or not, I have this cat named Frumpkin and I wear him like a scarf.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (meows)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Come here, I promise--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Immediately leaps up into your hands.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I promise not to do that too often. I just scritch, for a long time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He purrs against you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He can't even hear about it!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I draw the general gnoll peeing on a little fire hydrant and the rest of the gnolls behind him fighting over a bone?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Easy enough to do.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Then I'm going to draw the cutest baby manticore you've ever seen and it's dead! I'm going to tell the Traveler: You know, I don't know what's going on. I'm just hoping that you're here because this is the farthest I've ever gone and I'm afraid that you can't hear me anymore and it's freaking me out a little bit. Because I know that I'm around a bunch of people now and I haven't been before, but I want you to know that you're still my best friend and if you want me to be alone I will be if that means that you'll be here.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Beau just reaches over and hands her a kleenex.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Nothing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did you hear that?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm in the room with you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh. Right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm reading. While she was doing that, I'm opening the letters from the Baumbauchs.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh! Right.

lines.name: TRAVIS, LAURA
lines.text: Oh shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, finishing up with you. As you finish that and lay down, you lay on one side, staring towards the wall in this moment of quiet. You feel this strange warmth and you look down underneath your robes and there you have the symbol of the Traveler that you keep on yourself, the door arch and path, and it's warm to the touch, warmer than your skin is. The subtle sensation of familiar closeness comes over you, and wordless, but an emotion washes through your brain that's alien, from the outside of your own thoughts that just says, "I'm with you."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I take the symbol and I hold it up to my cheek and I go to sleep.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The third one you open up, and it's a complaint--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (kissing sounds) What is it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: From Rexxentrum. It's titled by-- it doesn't have the name but it says "The purveyor of the Rotted Stump", which is apparently some sort of bar or tavern saying, "To the Baumbauch family: I "would happily request that if you are to send the aforementioned and already paid shipments to our "establishment that they would not be containing any sort of animals of which could chew through "and ruin and spoil the shipments you've been given. We request an immediate refund." It shows a copy of a deal that was made. It's just an open complaint.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Nice.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The fourth one's a little interesting. It's just titled: To Demedan Baumbauch. Specifically.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Demedan! Ooh!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm sure that one's not important.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's mostly about mayonnaise.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's totally looking!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I know.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Dear Mr. Mayo. We relish the time we've had together.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Would I recognize what this word means?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an intelligence check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do I get any time of advantage for being a shifty person?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, because this would be an investigation check specifically, not an intelligence, it would be an investigation.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is this a code? Is this backwards? This is backwards, isn't it? Fuck balls.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You don't know.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Eight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Eight. Well. You're just going to have to figure it out on your own.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (singing) Fuck balls.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Toordolbo.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We'll come back to you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do I know what the Evening Nip is? Do I recognize that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't, actually.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You don't know the old evening nip? (laughter)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I finish reading everything, I go over to a sleeping Jester, pull her blankets up and tuck her in a little bit, and then I crash out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Two quick things. One, I'd like to ask Caleb, when he's done with his insanely long ritual: That pouch that I gave you, what was in it?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Did you give me a pouch?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, I gave you a pouch before. You might not have felt it, but it's in your back pocket.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: When did you do that?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Before?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, what is in it? Let's see.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Which pouch is this?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Shakäste's.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, Shakäste's pouch. You find what is roughly a handful of bird seed.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wouldn't it be funny if there was, like, two copper and a bunch of bird seed?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, it's a heavy pouch and contains about 113 gold pieces.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Whoa!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Shakäste was fucking loaded!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: One...

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh jeez.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Two...

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No long rest for you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And then ten minutes later--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's some dried jerky and hide in there, just for trail snacks. It seemed like a half road travel pack that Shakäste was keeping with him and whatever coin he had brought with him on the journey.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You stole an old blind man's food and money.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I am the best.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Did you say 113?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Come here.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes. Ow!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That was five of them.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, that's good, because my muscles are sore from smiling before.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It does help a little.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Then I'm going to try to make acid while he was doing his thing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll that plus your proficiency bonus and your intelligence.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 19, plus things.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It will take you through the night and part of the morning to do it. With a full night's sleep-- a full rest-- if you start early enough in the night, by about noon tomorrow you'd be done.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Throughout that, you manage to create a vial of acid.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Awesome.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I have a question: the metal on the ring with the pearl in it, what is it made of? Can I tell?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Looking at it, it looks like the base material for the pearl set in, it's a polished brass that has been treated to look like gold, but some of that treatment is rubbing off and you can see the duller brass color beneath.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I cannot remember, but Caleb can because of Keen Mind. Brass: is that part of the alchemy that I can do?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I will look. As far as your school of transmutation?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, that is correct.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You have copper and silver for sure.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Copper, silver, wood.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Iron?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I just can't remember if it is. Do we have a Player's Handbook?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Wood, stone, iron, copper, or silver.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Brass is not on it, okay. Then I'm going to spend the last 30 minutes before bed trying to slowly wedge the pearl out of the ring. I don't want the ring.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, make a general strength check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The pearl pops out and flies across the room, never to be found again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15? It doesn't take you too long. Working on it back and forth you eventually have enough give where the four claws that hold the pearl into the ring set eventually give way and it pops out. It does hit the ground and roll and you quickly catch up to it and grab it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's bronze?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Brass.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Brass, okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I take what's left of the ring and I throw it across the room for Frumpkin to go chasing it across.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Frumpkin just watches it land. (thunk, thunk)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Go chase that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (meows)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: While everybody is going up to their rooms, can I stay down-- are you staying down?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, I'm going upstairs, I'm going to pass out on the floor.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll stay downstairs and do some people-watching. Call it character study.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, yeah. Looking about, at this point in the evening most of it is filtering out. The few stragglers there are the older folks, grizzled farmhands with sunburned skin, thick fingers that have seen a lot of field work, a lot of them reminiscing about days of old, some of them talking about some folks they know that were lost over the previous events, but they seem drunk enough to at least be smiling and laughing about these old stories they bring up. You continue to study these personalities, I imagine you're probably taking in quirks, taking in elements of their body language, their vocal intonations for your own purposes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Very well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. As you all eventually close the evening, the morning sun comes to, with Nott sleeping in a little further after staying up late creating a vial of acid.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Please tell me she has bedhead.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: One ear's up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What do you guys want to do?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hey, Jester?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hey, what?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I want to show you something.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, what?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You know how I stole some shit from the Baumbauchs on our way out of town? Most of it's boring shit, but I stayed up and I was trying to solve it and figure some of this stuff out. Take a look at this, what do you think?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. I'm really smart, so I'll probably be able to figure it out. "Demedan, your request has "been approved and the toordolbo extract will be arriving in a case of rose wine from the Evening "Nip in the coming week. Many Gifts, The Gentleman."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (whispering) The Gentleman. Who's the Gentleman?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't know, but I like your addition of "douche" to Demedan, I agree.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Uh-huh, I wanted to put a reminder for myself.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh yeah, who specializes in a rosé? You're right, that's weird. Especially not the Baumbauchs.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, the Baumbauchs don't make rosé.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, they make, like, ale.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You're right. The place where I came from, you got-- certain regions are going to make certain kinds of wines. That might tell us where it's come from. And, what do you think-- I think the "oblodoro" I think that's a code.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: "Toordolbo."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I think it's bloodroot.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, bloodroot, that's good.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That sounds like a thing, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What if it's the "boltodoor?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's a possibility. I haven't ruled anything out yet.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Bloodroot is probably pretty good, though.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do I know of bloodroot?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a nature check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Nature check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Would

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a nature check. You both may make a nature check in this moment, in a strike of inspiration.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Better than me. 13.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, you've heard it somewhere. Nothing big, but, like, bloodroot, I've heard of it. You know it. It's a unique flower that is pretty in its own right, but you know it because the places where it's used are usually fenced off in a way that children can't get to them because they are known to be poisonous. Not to the point of death, but to the point of severe nausea and vomiting upon ingestion.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Super bad. That's bad.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And they're wanting an extract, so--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That means it would be extra strong, yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are the Baumbauchs trying to poison people?!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my gosh! Well, the Gentleman wants to poison people. Oh, no, the Baumbauchs, yeah, I understand. Wow, do we need to tell someone about this?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No. Just keep it in the back of your head if you hear something, if something spikes your interest--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: If we hear about an outbreak of people vomiting--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: --or about a Gentleman.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Or about a rosé.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And an Evening Nip.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I want to know about these evening nipples-- evening nip.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: There you go, Freudian slip.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: In the coming

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How many days has it been?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's been probably, at this point, four days, would be my guess.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my gosh, what if we could intercept it? Then we could have all of the poison, and the nips.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Interesting.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I like it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Let's keep this-- we'll workshop it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let's make a decision!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We just did it!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah we did, we definitely did.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh man, I'm really hungry, though, I'm going to go downstairs.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Let's get some food.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys all wake up and get your breakfast situated and sorted, Nott joining you a little later on, but you are fed, the morning is fresh, what would you like to do?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, I guess it's time to collect on those ears, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: These ears.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes, those ears.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "How many set of ears have been procured?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 19 sets.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "19 sets?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Or 19 total?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Technically Matt, I'm not telling Bryce this, five of those sets are hyenas. 14 of those are gnolls for sure.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Bryce has a hard time telling the difference at the moment, having been overworked and stressed with the recent goings-on.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (whispering) We are assholes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Counting through, they finish each bit counted. "That comes to--" They pull up a small chest and begin to count out change into a large sack. Then that fills up into a secondary sack, into a third one, finishing with, "A total of 570 gold pieces."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We also brought home live people and also some dead people. We brought home seven dead bodies.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Seven dead bodies at five gold per seven, that will come to 35 gold pieces as well." Which they fill out for you. "Then the live ones were how many?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 25 gold a piece. How many live people did we bring back? I didn't have those in jars.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: There were the two.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Jules, Petrov, Herma--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I would remember exactly. I don't, but I do.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's right I did write down Herma and Jules, Petrov.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Then there was a couple that Shakäste had in the--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh wait!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hold because if he knows he has to tell me because I picked the right feat for it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh that's right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (cheering)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Damn!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're fucking rich!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait, did anybody write down the amount that he said?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 570 for the gnolls, 35 for the--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: A hundred a piece already.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And a fourth sack is presented as they count out 300-ish more gold pieces.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my gosh! That's so good!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's a little over a hundred gold each.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's so great!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not bad, almost can afford a suit of armor.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: A-Fjord?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Don't instigate it! You'll regret it.

lines.name: LAURA, MARISHA
lines.text: 150 gold a piece!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are we going to divvy it up?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We are so excited over chump change to Vox Machina.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: After all the counting is done Bryce is writing down feverishly, "For my own ledgers, because I do have to present this paperwork to the crown for the approval of these rewards, what do we call you?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We should have talked about this. What do you guys think?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're very strong.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's true we are. We're very strong.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We have to leave a paper trail, is that a thing that actually has to happen?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What if we're The Strong?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're like the mighty.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The Mighty! That's good!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hey there new guy, you know good words that like sound cool in Zemnian right?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We are The Mighty Nein.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Nein?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Nein!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The Mighty Nein.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I can buy that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, why not? There's one, two, three, four--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's just a spelling that is tricky.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Please, do spell it for me."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah 'Mighty' in Common is spelled M-I--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I will pull your beard off your face.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my god!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes?"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We are The Mighty Nein.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I feel like I was part of something crowd sourced similar to this." I feel like I've been part of a game call "Mighty Number Nine."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh. Really?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. It's a game that I-- It's a Mega Man--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Nein, nein, nein.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's the number nine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, I know. Oh that game. Anyway!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right, The Mighty Nein, that is on the paperwork. Are you staying a while in Alfield then?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are we staying here? I mean, do you want to keep hiring us for always?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I don't have much in the way of work here for your type at the moment."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You seem to be at peace with the current situation, I think it might be in our best interest that we moved on.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Passing through.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Whereabouts are you going?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're going to Zadash.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Interesting, well that's much larger for the tastes of most field folk out here. I lived there for about three years when I was younger, in the West Outersteads before joining the Crownsguard and shipping off to Bladegarden. If you are indeed off to Zadash and are in need of a friend, if she's still there. Ask for Claudia Sheed at the Leaky Tap.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sheet, did you say Sheet?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Claudia Sheed."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: At the Leaky Tap?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "At the Leaky Tap at the East Outersteads."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, I should ask you, is that like the big inn, the big place?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It is of moderate size."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What would be the biggest inn in Zadash? Like the biggest place that if you go like, "Oh, I need to find the biggest inn in Zadash," this is what it is?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That would be the The Pillow Trove. That's in Tri-Spires. I don't know if you can afford that? I don't know, maybe you can! I don't know."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The Pillow Trove.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Good luck."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's where we're staying?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No. That's a fancy inn.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Was is pillow or pillar?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "The Pillow Trove. But The Leaky Tap I recommend. Claudia's great; she owns the place if she's still there."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Leaky Tap?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Leaky Tap.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Not Tavern, Tap.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Leaky Tap Tavern?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I have presented for you this cart that we had made. It belonged to somebody here, but it is now yours. It is well made, it is larger than what you had previously and does not smell of blood and feces."

lines.name: SAM, TALIESIN
lines.text: Yet! (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Give us a day.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Very well." She steps back and starts getting the two horses, one that you had brought along and the other that you had discovered out there. They've already been hitched to the cart.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Have they had water?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Fed and watered, cleaned, brushed.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is that enough horses? Should we be getting two more to pull us faster?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Two is pretty decent, I think.

lines.name: LAURA

lines.name: MATT

lines.text: "Of course."

lines.text: "I'll be right back. We've taken--" And at that point you hear a slapping sound, you watch as Shumas the dragonborn, she's taken the large manticore head. And is chained into the side and slammed it on to the side of the cart. You still have that.

lines.text: Du

lines.name: MATT

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes. I was thinking a really good thing you could do for us in return is to give my friend Fjord here a letter of recommendation to the Academy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "What?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He did a great service to your city.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As the Watchmaster has notified me."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Starosta, it's good to see you again. It's been a while, about, hold on. I get out my sketchbook and I look through it. Maybe like eight years almost? Your hair hasn't changed though, you should change it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm confused? This is strange, but no I believe that our business is complete."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The Ruby of The Sea says hello.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You watch as his face loses color. His hand drops to his side. "Um. I will be happy to write you a letter of recommendation, but I cannot assure you that it will be accepted as there are many points of acceptance within the Academy. And is quite a bit of travel to Rexxentrum anyway. Is this to the actual Soltryce?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Of course.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If you wouldn't mind, that would be most kind of you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Very well, it will be done in just a moment. What is your name?"

lines.text: Fjord.

lines.text: "I'll return in the next 15 minutes." Starosta turns and gives a long look of simmering fury behind a forced smile to Jester. Spins around then walks off in a haughty march to wherever he came from.

lines.text: Okay. This makes sense for you since you grew up in the Menagerie Coast, though in Port Damali. The Ruby of the Sea is well known in some circles. You've only heard rumors. Belongs to an establishment that specializes in all forms of socializing, entertainment, and is one of the most prominent brothels in the Menagerie Coast, in which the Ruby of the Sea is known to be the star courtesan. Many travel all across the Menagerie Coast and beyond, supposedly, to be within her company. Many have fallen in love with her and had their hearts broken. There are poems and songs that have wandered through bars and taverns that spoke of her, that first caught your interest. It seems like a faint, distant tale that was just a myth that people made up or someone spoke of. Ruby of the Sea, it sounds amorphous.

lines.name: MATT

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Fjord, it's your letter.

lines.name: MATT

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Bye.

lines.text: He huffs off, they all begin to leave as you guys go to your cart. The Watchmaster comes up one last time and they say, "Sincerely, you've saved many lives and... A paltry sum I could get approved, but know that you have my gratitude.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, right?

lines.text: We have to go.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm so impressed.

lines.text: It's so true. Yeah, let's leave while we're on a high note.

lines.text: Just you know--

lines.text: No, no, no. I'm a goblin.

As you begin to come higher up to the top of that hillside, you can watch these peaks slowly unveil into the rest of the massive skyline of the city of Zadash, breaking the horizon.

lines.name: MATT

Some take note of your presence and watch as you pass and then go amongst their work; others are too involved, could care less about the constant passing of travelers northward and southward. As you approach closer to the city still, the external neighborhoods begin to envelop your vision as small farmsteads, homes, begin to mingle with these tents and shacks you had seen at a distance. A mother in ragged clothes plucks a chicken before noticing your band and sending her six-year-old boy over, dirt smeared on his face and no shoes, running up to the mud outside the cart and puts his hands out towards you as you walk past.

The fairer races beyond that haven't caught your eye yet on this exterior perimeter. Stepping beyond, the crownsguard keeping a watch as you pass, you emerge beyond the threshold of the entry gate on the southern wall here, into Zadash. The smell of wet earth, manure immediately hits your nose, accompanied by the sound of hooves, mingling conversations, distant shouts, and the barking of dogs as they welcome you into this new and interesting city. Glancing up, you can see the buildings around you that flank the street continue to be rather destitute in the atmosphere, but then eventually begin to graduate into a standard village feel. You've arrived.

"So now that you've arrived. What's your business here? What can I help you with? What do you want to see? What can I show you?"
