lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sell some things?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We need to get to a blacksmith. Oh, we need to go somewhere that'll buy expensive-y magic-y things and somewhere that'll buy junky, shitty things.

lines.name: TALIESIN, LAURA
lines.text: Antiques.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Both of those you can probably find in the Pentamarket."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Penta-what now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Pentamarket."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Pentamarket. Would the Pentamarket also have the finest inks

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It would have probably some of the finer inks, yes. The finest you could probably find there or in the Tri-Spires."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Tri-Spies?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Tri-Spires."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What about of arcane quality?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Actually, if we're going towards the Pentamarket, your best luck there would be the Invulnerable Vagrant. Yes."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The Invulnerable Vagrant?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Excellent names in this place.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Also, I am a collector of rare tomes. I have a great appreciation for literature. Where might I find the most--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nudie picture books!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: --elaborate writings in the city?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That would probably be at the Archive.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The Archive?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Could you give me a little more background? That is a very common word.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "The Archive of the Cobalt Soul here in the city. It's a library that is maintained by a number of... believers. But as long as you're not taking anything from within, and you have approved entry and are heavily watched within, for the most part you can peruse the content of the interior."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is there any place that has pulp fiction and shitty smut?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I mean, I'm sure there are, but I would not bother myself with such base interests of reading."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Insight check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an insight check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That is 23.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So many whispers!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: My friend-- I take him by the hands and say, You have given us a great welcome into this city.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "My pleasure."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So eager to learn all about it. I take my hands away, and he has two gold in his hand. Just know, I'm a big reader.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Look at my own notes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It worked!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "On the southern side of the Silken Terrace, you'll find a place known as Chastity's Nook. That may be where you'll find what you're looking for, friend."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That was one of the names of the other courtesans at the place my mom--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's a good name for her, Chastity Nook. Yeah, that's good.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We'll probably be staying at the Leaky Tap.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "The Leaky Tap, you say? Well, it's affordable."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're trying to keep a low profile.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Fair enough, fair enough. The Leaky Tap, that'll be in the East Outersteads, actually. Bit of a rowdy clientele."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Perfect for me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It's bawdy and fun."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Definitely perfect for me. Would you say there's a reasonable bathhouse for someone who's--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Stinky?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: --and complicated, in the horns?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "For your clientele--"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Somewhere I can take a nice bath in peace.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That could be--" You guys are really--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. Run us through it, Encyclopedia Britannica. Give it to us.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Don't want to scare the locals too much.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Not yet.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Don't you?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "The Steam's Respite."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That'll do it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Caleb heard that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I throw another gold at him. You are a fount of information.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That's what I'm here for."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The Pillow Trove. Is that in the Tri-Spires?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That is." He glances quickly over towards Caleb. "You aren't planning to stay there, are you?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Why?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We've heard good things.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "They work for a certain clientele."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You can be frank.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What kind of clientele?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Those who live in the Tri-Spire or can afford to stay at the-- Well, you're welcome to try."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are they super snooty there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You could say that, yes."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do they not like you very much?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Not anymore."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You used to be a regular?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I was a man about town, yes."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Was?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, things change. Life changes. Partners disappear with your business's goods and funds and leave you having to make a living showing people around the city."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's telling, yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's awful.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That does sound terrible.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It's very sad, I know. But anyway."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What shop did you used to own?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We used to run a business that sold and traded leathers, but I was ousted and I've been scraping by ever since."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are you a craftsman in the trade?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I was more of a business connection, if you will. My partner was the crafter. I knew a few things I'd picked up throughout the years, but--"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I mean, a businessman can sell anything, right? Why don't you get back into it? You still have all those connections.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Put it this way. Strangely enough, I make half as much with a quarter of the emphasis doing what I'm doing for you now."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fair.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Lot of people come through town?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "A lot of people come through town."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is it easy to work around the Empire here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It can be. You can look for work. You can head to the--" He points out here. This would be, "The Signet Wall, if you're more of a sellsword."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The Signet Wall?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "The Signet Wall. That's where the military stays, and most of the Crownsguard are holed up."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let's not go there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do you know a good blacksmith?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "The Pentamarket would be a place where you could find. There is the Spark Hammer Smithing, that would be of aid to you. There's also Packwearer's Provisions, but they're more of a smaller scale, smithing goods, tools, and such."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: More of an antique collector.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Maybe he'll want that helmet.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. I think we learned a lot.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's been an absolute pleasure."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, but Ulysses, we like you so much!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're looking forward to seeing you again. To the inn!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Where do you stay?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, it appears that our business transaction has come to an end. If you would like to rent another day, I'd be happy to answer your questions."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Shittiest pay phone ever.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, come see us at the Leaky Tap and maybe we'll hire you tomorrow morning.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's true!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He goes, "Maybe."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I have extreme syphilis.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a deception check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: One.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The fact that that was your lie scares him more than believing it could've ever done. He goes, "Very well. Enjoy your stay at the Leaky Tap. I'll be on my way." He throws his hood up and darts back out into the rain.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh man, I liked him. I'm almost sad that we didn't believe him at first.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Was he trustworthy?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I mean, no, he's not trustworthy, but we are birds of a feather.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Don't trust trusting people, they're just the worst.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He was trustworthy enough that he wasn't going to, you know.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, I have full faith in untrustworthy people.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes, he was predictably a shit, just as we are.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I forgot to ask him about bakeries, so I am going to keep an eye out for them.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will aid her in that search.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You guys are making your way towards the East Outersteads?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Would we be passing through the Pentamarket on the way to the Leaky Tavern?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You'd have to curve around to do that. Do you want to?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do things shut down in an hour here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't know. Well, you've been here.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I've been here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: In fact, probably the last thing you did before your family said, "Come home," was here. You know it a little bit. You've been to the Pentamarket, you would be able to guide the rest of them through the Pentamarket if you wanted to.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do I know that it stays? Do they keep later hours?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Some know that those who drink and revel sometimes make poor choices in their purchases, so it can vary.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We can sleep first and then get settled into the Leaky Tap, and then sell our shit tomorrow.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'd like to say maybe selling our shit now. That way it doesn't get robbed in the night.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Either way.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm inclined to agree, actually. The longer we keep it out here, the more eyes will be on it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I think the Pentamarket's that way. I've got a hunch. We can just slide by and see. Small detour.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Might be no one home.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Comparable to Port Damali, but much taller. Damali was a little more spread out. This has architecture and buildings that are designed to rise, and almost seem to curve when you're looking up at it. In certain moments, if you're not careful, it can give a hint of vertigo, just at the height of some of these structures.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Like New York compared to L.A.?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Rexxentrum is still easily twice the size of this city. As you make your way outside of the Pentamarket, and it's called this because central to Zadash, a number of the streets that bisect it naturally carved a pentagonal shape and the interior between all these streets has since become the center of most merchant business, and there's a bazaar set up in the center of that penta-shape, where carts and tents and buildings are out there all day, every day. It's an open market. As you're making your way through the rain, some of them are closing early. Some of them are closing up because of the weather, and it's not going as well as most days would when it isn't so freezing. You can see your breath escaping from you with each exhale. You ask around a bit. Make an investigation check, as you're guiding the troupe.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. 13 plus four is 17.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The first thought is, that velvet's going to get ruined in this rain! As you approach the exterior of it, the building is untouched. It is dry. You do glance up, and you can see, carved delicately into a wood placard above the doors, which are currently closed, but little slips of glass in each door reveal a warm, lit interior that's glowing from the inside out. It says, The Invulnerable Vagrant.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Caleb. I think this is going to be where you're going to stock up on your incense and some other goodies.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes, yes. I won't be long. Excuse me. And I just push in.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to find mulled wine. It's cold, and I want to be warm.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll join in that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I want to try to sell the glaive here, if it's magic. If they sell magical weapons at this place.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Who's entering?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll go in, too.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll wait back.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll go in as well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys staying out?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We'll watch the cart and we're going to take the cart to find some mulled wine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The chin's a bit square and the physicality is hunched and there's just a big smile on the face.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm sorry. Yes. I've not been in this big a city in a while.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a nature check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have not encountered this folk before in your travels. It's rare to see them ingrained in society this close. Firbolgs--

lines.name: MARISHA, LAURA
lines.text: Firbolgs?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, firbolgs.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, they are usually a more nature-based, free-spirited people that live more towards the mountains of the northern forests in the Greying Wildlands and beyond. To see one here in society catches you off-guard, let alone one that's dressed so well. You can see these long elegant robes of deep green and gold and this big smile on his face as he spins around. "Yes. I'm happy to help you."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: DM. Sorry. Before I engage in this. You say I've never encountered these, but I've read a lot.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. You know

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I know of them. This is my first encounter.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Dive in.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hello. Wow. Look at those horns. I'm so sorry. You know, I have never-- Forget it. I am looking for-- I have been in the woods for so long, I'm so happy to be in a metropolis again. I need ink.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Before we can get to that, I just have to say you're, respectfully, terribly filthy. And this is an establishment that I have to insist requires some more cleanliness." As he waves his hand in front of you, you watch as all the dirt on your coat just begins to sift away. Your clothing becomes clean right up the front of you reaching up towards your neck. The dirt begins to fleck away across your face.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm tilting. I'm arching my face.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you fight it, a moment passes and you see before you for the first time since you've met, a sparkly clean Caleb.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Caleb?! What have you done to him?! What have you done to Caleb?!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh, you're just an excitable little friend there, aren't you?" This giant hand goes down and pats you on the head.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ah! It's gentle.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't see. I have no idea.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Caleb, you're beautiful!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At this point, the two other figures in the back turn around and it's the same guy.

lines.name: LIAM, SAM
lines.text: What?!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's two more of the same firbolg. The same outfit. Same exact visual. They both go, "Hi!" "Hi."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, this is a little off-putting.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I Invoke Duplicity.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Ho, ho, ho! Well, that's just impressive."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're impressive!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He reaches out and puts his hand out to shake your hand. "What's your name?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Jester.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "And what's your name?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, that's Jester #2.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It goes through her hand.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know. I'm sorry about that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh, that's an illusion. Okay. I'm Enchanter Pumat Sol. And this--" "I am also Enchanter Pumat Sol." And the third one goes, "I myself am also Enchanter Pumat Sol."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: First question that I have for you, Pumats.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "The fourth one's in the back."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Pumat Sol, is there one of you and this is fun and games or you are--?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "There's the prime Pumat Sol and the three of us are what you would call magically manifested duplicates to aid in his work."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Understood. Well, I only came here for business, so--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well! Welcome to the establishment: The Invulnerable Vagrant greets all of you humbly."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I am finding it very hard to concentrate at the moment, but I know that I need paper and the most expensive ink you have.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh, we have both of those things, come with me." He turns around and you can see now as he turns around his head is about to smack into one of these candles and he just-- knowing where it is. He's been so practiced, he just ducks under it and continues walking toward the back. "He needs some--" "Oh I heard him." He turns around and takes down a couple of inkwells and sets them in front. The other one is pulling out stacks of paper and parchment and is stacking them up, and they set them there. "All right, so how much do you need of how much of each?"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You know--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This guy's our new Gilmore, you guys!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I am not seducing this person.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You say this now!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Touché!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Five hundred hours later we're fighting gods with him!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I need your most fine arcane ink and I also need your finest paper. I need about 150 gold worth of materials. Is that too much to ask?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No, that's comparably, respectfully, a paltry sum. We can get that paper to you. When you say ink, I have to specify: do you want ink that's used in the ritualistic design and presentation of arcane symbols, scribes, and glyphs? Or you looking for ink that itself is actually enchanted for various uses and manifestation?"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No. I pull two scrolls out of my pack. I have these. I found them in my journeys and I want to make them a part of my repertoire.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He goes ahead and they muster the paper and ink that will easily be utilized for scribing.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So glad we're not really outside, we're only physically outside. We get to be at the table, and it's so nice!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Enchanter Pumat Sol, do you have any health potions we might be able to acquire from you?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We have a few in stock, actually. You want to--" and he's like "I'm already on it." Then he turns around and pulls out a large, eight vial collecting case that he sets on the table. "That's one there. And there's another. We've got a variety of vials at your disposal, so let us know what you're looking for."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How much would a greater healing potion run me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That? Let's see here. That would put you back about 200 gold pieces for a single vial."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How about one of the more basic healing potions?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "A general?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: A general, yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That'll put you at a simple 50 gold pieces."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll take one of those.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It would be my pleasure, Mr. Green Man."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think I'll buy--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "What's your name, by the way?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fjord.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Fjord. Pleasure to meet you."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nice to meet you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm sorry, I didn't mean to disrespect your invitation there. What's your name?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm Nott! I'm just Nott! Hi! Nice to meet you!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Nice to meet you."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're large!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You're small."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can I have one? I'll have two of those potions, if you don't mind.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Of course."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is there a discount for two?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a persuasion check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm sorry, but this is a business. No discounts, but we're happy to sell for the price of 50 gold apiece."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, I'll take two."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All righty, thank you very much."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Enchanter Purvon-- Permansol?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Pumat Sol."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Pooman Sol.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Pumat.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Pumat Sol.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's like "Poor Matt's soul."

lines.name: LAURA, MARISHA
lines.text: Poor Matt's soul!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It feels very meta.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you guys deal in magical weapons here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We deal with all sorts of enchanted items." He turns as one of the other guys over there goes, "I've got it. We have all manner of objects that we've crafted, enchanted, and designed."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Would you like to buy this?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh, are you looking to sell or trade?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It depends on how much you want to pay for it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, let's go ahead and clear off." He takes the vials off the counter and they set a space, and the three of them sit around. You hear this voice behind this thick curtain go, "Is anybody able to help me here for a minute?" "Right there. The two of you, continue this." One of them goes in the back room to help the fourth one.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does the fourth one look just like you?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: There's a fourth?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, there's four of them.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I thought there was three.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That's Pumat Prime. He's the real guy. But anyway, let's have a look at this." You put down the glaive, you said? "This isn't too bad." Hand me the item card.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Fleshrender.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Meanwhile, I take every gold piece I have in a little sack, plus 20 silver, which is exactly 150, and I am out of money.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With that, they happily pass over to you your purchased parchment and ink.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How much is that glaive worth?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "This is pretty well made for being such a ghastly-looking design. I think it could easily use some fine gold gilding, maybe some extra polishing. Put some ribbons on it and this thing would be a great ceremonial piece. The manticore spines I think are a little garish, personally, but if you're looking to sell, we could give this to you for about 300 gold."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Insight check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That is a 17.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Ooh!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What are you insighting?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: To see if he's--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Giving a good deal.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I looked at the paper, motherfucker.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (whispering) I'm going to kill you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (whispering) Seven days.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I feel like this guy's a good guy.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You just died.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, I have to make a new character, guys, I'm sorry.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What do you think, Caleb?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I think that he's just dealing with used items.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't know what that means.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You could work him for a little bit, not a lot.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Mind you, if we're doing it for trade, prices can be a little more in your favor, but understand, I'm a business for profit."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You said it needs a little decoration. I take the ribbon off my horn and I wrap it around the handle and I tie it on. What about now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "302 gold. But for trade, I'll probably be able to muster a little more. What are you looking for?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We are looking for something that can hold a lot of doughnuts in it, and also maybe some other things that are heavy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Let me have a look here and see what we can muster. You're looking for something that could-- you traveling type? Is that right?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes. Like a briefcase of carrying.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "A briefcase of carrying?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: A backpack of--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: A knapsack of--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: A short case of--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: A clutch of objects.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: A handbag of endless bottom.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: A cheat code, if you will.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'll tell you what. If you give me this here majestic weapon, with the ribbon included, and an additional 200 gold pieces on top of that trade, I can just go ahead--" and the other guy who's wandered away goes, "We can take this here fantastic haversack off the wall and make it yours.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is this fantastic haversack--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: A Bag of Holding?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Let me show you." He sets it down, and it's this--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is he beating us at our own game?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's two side pouches on it beyond the big central one. He opens it up, takes the glaive, and, "Watch this!" and it disappears into it. He reaches in, pulls the glaive out.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Whoa. That's pretty cool.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That looks like the thing that we need.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He goes, "The side ones don't carry as much, but the central side of it does manage to carry about eight cubic feet of material in an extra-dimensional space to call it whenever you require it. Two cubic feet for both of the side pouches. I enchanted it. Well, he enchanted it. We sell it."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: If we make this deal, does it come with a regular healing potion inside of it, maybe?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a persuasion check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Regular potion, regular potion.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Come on, La.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I mean, that's cocked a little bit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I appreciate your gusto. Were perhaps we had more of a business relationship together, I would consider such a deal, but as this is the first real transaction and time in which we have encountered you and your band of once-filthy travelers, I'm going to have to decline."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Jester, Wand of Smiles. What about for the wand, too?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I really like it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's a good wand. It's a good stick.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It is a real good stick. I'm going to keep it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You might need a good laugh.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I can think of uses for that. I'm not here, goddamn it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We need that sack!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Jester. Shits and giggles or utility, is the question here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Utility here, I'm buying this sack for all of us here.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We need this sack to keep our stuff in it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You have enough gold to cover it?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Of course. And don't worry, once my mom sends me my care package, we'll have thousands upon thousands of gold.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "So is that a deal?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 200 gold for this beautiful bag. But! I feel like it could be a little prettier. Is there anything you can do to make it prettier for us?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He goes, "I'm sorry, I was summoned to make something prettier?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'd really like, you know, pretty. I'm going to be carrying it, I'd like it to match my outfit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "What's your favorite color?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Pink!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (Arcane incantation) He finishes and he watches the haversack suddenly shimmers past, and the dull, general, brown leather turns to a bright, vibrant pink.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ah! It's beautiful! 200 gold, here you go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right, good. I hope you enjoy it. I'm going to get back to work. Keep it up, me." He goes in the back room. He takes the glaive off. The other guy says, "All right, thank you very much. Any other business you require?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Nope.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You need some pastries, but we'd need somewhere else.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We'll go somewhere else for that. I doubt you guys sell pastries.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "There's plenty of vendors. With the raining outside and so late, probably hard to find pastries tonight, but fresh in the morning, just let your nose carry you around. The Pentamarket has plenty."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's such a good deal. Here's another 50 gold.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It would be my pleasure."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Thanks.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you know what's the blacksmith, if the-- where did I write it, it disappeared-- the Spark Hammer Smithing would still be open right now, or are they going to be closed?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "They're probably still working. You can maybe convince them to take a conversation."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okie dokie. Thank you so much.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No worries. Just listen for the clanging and the sparks. All right, if that's all, I wish you all adieu, come back any time. We're happy to sell, buy, trade, and generally help out anyone who has money."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Man, I want to learn that trick real bad.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Which trick? Oh, the pink-ify?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, where you make real versions of yourself that you get to hang out with!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Thank you for your time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It's my pleasure."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Did we find mulled wine? Did we find a wine vendor?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh yeah. No, especially with it so cold outside, you can see there were two different carts that had small, pot-heated, basic alcohol and ciders.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If there were any little confectionaries with that too, we would have bought whatever they had left.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We buy pastries for Jester.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Also, where in the year are we in relation to Winter's Crest?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Winter's Crest is actually only celebrated in Tal'Dorei. It does not have cultural significance here in Wildemount. I believe you are three to four months out from it. I'll have to check the calendar. You guys are just now cresting into the beginning of fall.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. Good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you guys step outside, you are immediately met by Beauregard and Molly, who have come back with some small wooden cups filled with heated, steaming mulled wine and a small care package of baked goods. Which would mark you guys off at about, I'd say total of six silver for the bunch.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I got it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I need the tarts.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Why do you need them? I like them.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I cast spells with them. I need just a couple.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But I like to eat them.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, but I need them.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We bought enough for everybody.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll take two.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (Napoleon Dynamite voice) Jester, give me your tarts!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How many tarts do I have?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How many did you buy?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: A solid baker's dozen.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Then we all eat them.

lines.name: MARISHA, TALIESIN
lines.text: I have one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You may have to come back and buy more tarts in the morning.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: If you want one. Do you want one? No, Fjord's good.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I have six left. That's okay, I have six left.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They're really bright and garish. Really good.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Red velvet. It's good.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can we say we go and try to sell some of this stuff, or do you guys want to do this next time?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The rain begins to let up a little bit. It's still sprinkling, but at least the heavy downpour has subsided a bit. You make your way through the slushy mud pits that the streets have become, weaving your way between horses and various wagons being pulled through, individuals that are hooded and bundled making their way around. Eventually discovering the outskirts of the Leaky Tap. As you guys step into the warm interior, pulling your hoods back, we'll pick up on that next week. We've got these guys have way too early flights to go to this convention tomorrow.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What time of day is it as we arrive at the Leaky Tap?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's about an hour and a half past dusk.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thank you guys for getting pastries for all of us. That was so sweet.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Those men were incredible. The Canadians.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's the stuff they serve at the German Christmas markets. There's pastry and mulled wine everywhere.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He is instantly at the top.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Where did those cow men come from, Matt?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The facial configuration, too.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Where does firbolg come from?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: One of my favorites.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just world building. Probably fever dream while I'm working on this stuff.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I wish there was more of me.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Nyquil does some weird shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (Pumat Sol voice) Just come back and try and buy and trade for more things. You know where to find them.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fuck, so good.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (Pumat Sol voice) Just been writing campaign lore for too long.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thank you guys so much for being patient. Thank you for watching, I hope you enjoyed the show. Go visit these guys at Emerald City Comic Con if you have the opportunity. Isn't Khary there as well, yeah? You can go say hi to Shakäste himself.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: There's so many people there. It's going to be so much fun.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Swamp Khary Payton with CR love. Swamp him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: [music]
